articles.title: Basquiat's Skull Painting and 8-Bit NFT CryptoPunks Avatars Made Half of Christie's New York US$210m Evening Sale | Auctions News - TheValue.com
articles.description: Christie’s New York sets the bar high for New York marquee auction week. Earlier tonight, the 21st Century Evening Sale raked in a total of US$210m and was spearheaded by the highest-grossing American artist Basquiat’s skull painting, which realized US$93m to…
